strings.operationalLearningHeadingDescription: Operational learning in emergencies is the lesson learned from managing and dealing with crises, refining protocols for resource allocation, decision-making, communication strategies, and others.  The summaries are generated using AI and Large Language Models, based on data coming from Final DREF Reports, Emergency Appeal reports and others.
strings.pendingMessage: Request for generating operational learning summary is currently pending. Please wait a moment.
strings.startedMessage: Process of generating operational learning summary has started. This may take a few moments.
strings.errorMessage: Encountered an error while attempting to generate operational learning summary. Please try again later. If the issue continues, please contact us at {link}.
strings.emptyMessage: There are no summaries available at the moment. Please adjust your filters or try again later.
strings.filteredEmptyMessage: Current filters did not return any operational learning summaries. Please try adjusting or clearing your filters to check for available operational learning summaries.
strings.disclaimerMessage: This is an updated implementation of the Operational Learning project started by the DREF and PER teams at IFRC. The previous dashboard can be found {link}.
strings.failedToFetchSummary: Failed to fetch operational learning summary
